response.overview: The US recently launched another billion dollar aid package to intensify its "War On Drugs." But some Washington analysts claim this war will become another Vietnam. Filmed over a year in four countries, this documentary brings us coca-growing peasants, anti-narcotic patrols, US law-makers and gains unique access to the Columbian rebels who stand accused of protecting the drug trade.
response.title: Coca mama, la guerra antidrogas
